SEARCH
Package com.mimecast.robin.smtp.security

Class ConnectionTracker

java.lang.Object
com.mimecast.robin.smtp.security.ConnectionTracker
public final class ConnectionTracker extends Object
Tracks connection state for DoS protection.

This utility maintains per-IP connection counts, connection rate history, command counts, and other metrics used for rate limiting and abuse detection.

Thread-safe implementation using concurrent data structures. Automatic cleanup of stale entries via scheduled maintenance task.
